name: Unauthorized Archaeology Trip
description:
Long time no see! This was an interactive environment I created for a class at uni. The theme was 'Journey'. Have a good explore and look around, there's a couple hidden details to be found! Some stuff you can click on to interact. WASD and mouse to move around, right click to zoom the camera in.

Unfortunately, this project was pretty rushed toward the end of the semester, so the environment isn't as polished as I would like it to be - I wanted it absolutely jam packed with detail. Unfortunately,  it wasn't meant to be! But I'm still pretty happy with the environment as it is :) I don't have any plans currently to come back to it at this time. Hope you enjoy! 

Credits:

Asset List:

‘Low Hum’ sound by freesound user unfa, used in temple area of level for ambience. https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/154902/

‘wind in tree white birch 01’ by freesound user klankbeeld, used in suburb area of level for ambience. https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/131032/

I also used assets from the following games that I’ve made myself:

  • Medusa’s Atlantis
  • The Cypher Master’s Puzzle Box
  • Melbourne Architecture Viewer
